title: `cargo test` panics: no MIR available for DefId

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Edit: added reproducible example ### Code [This is a minimal (i think) example of a crate that makes Cargo panic.](https://github.com/rMazeiks/dioxus/tree/minimal-cargo-panic) lib.rs: ```rust mod inner { pub struct conflict; impl conflict { pub fn do_stuff(&self) {} } } mod conflict {} pub use inner::*; ``` examples/example.rs ```rust fn main() { dioxus::conflict.do_stuff(); } ``` Test or run the example to get the panic: ``` # cargo panics: cargo test # or cargo run --example example ``` ### Meta Reproduced on both stable and nightly. I'm on linux but CI tells me this also occurs on Windows and MacOS. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.60.0 (7737e0b5c 2022-04-04) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7737e0b5c4103216d6fd8cf941b7ab9bdbaace7c commit-date: 2022-04-04 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.60.0 LLVM version: 14.0.0 rustc 1.62.0-nightly (ecd44958e 2022-05-10) binary: rustc commit-hash: ecd44958e0a21110d09862ee080d95a4ca6c52f8 commit-date: 2022-05-10 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_monomorphize/src/collector.rs:993:9: no MIR available for DefId(20:7 ~ dioxus[5642]::inner::{impl#0}::do_stuff) ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/ecd44958e0a21110d09862ee080d95a4ca6c52f8/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1335:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f9fa9915e7d - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h85cc47332f2b05a9 at /rustc/ecd44958e0a21110d09862ee080d95a4ca6c52f8/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f9fa9915e7d - clone 47: 0x0 - note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.62.0-nightly (ecd44958e 2022-05-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack error: could not compile `dioxus` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... warning: `dioxus` (lib test) generated 2 warnings (2 duplicates) ```
